data.name: Bulorgus
data.detailed_description:
Play as a little creature named Gorgus as he uses his newfound alien technology to get home in the first platformer of its kind.

Bounce through hundreds of fun and thoughtfully designed levels by using the recoil from hitting objects!

Find over 30 cute secret cats hidden throughout this strange world!


  • This is a really great game you're gonna love it.
data.about_the_game:
Play as a little creature named Gorgus as he uses his newfound alien technology to get home in the first platformer of its kind.

Bounce through hundreds of fun and thoughtfully designed levels by using the recoil from hitting objects!

Find over 30 cute secret cats hidden throughout this strange world!


  • This is a really great game you're gonna love it.
data.short_description: Play as Gorgus as he uses his newfound alien fan to get back home. Bounce through dozens of unique and interconnected areas by using the recoil from hitting nearby objects! Gain crazy speed and find secret cats hidden throughout the world!
data.supported_languages:
English*, French*, Italian*, German*, Spanish - Spain*, Arabic*, Bulgarian*, Czech*, Danish*, Dutch*, Finnish*, Greek*, Hungarian*, Japanese*, Korean*, Norwegian*, Polish*, Portuguese*, Portuguese - Brazil*, Romanian*, Russian*, Simplified Chinese*, Spanish - Latin America*, Swedish*, Thai*, Traditional Chinese*, Turkish*, Ukrainian*, Vietnamese*
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows XP or later
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 M380
  • Memory: 32 MB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9.0 Compatible GPU
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Bulorgus

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Snow Leopard or later, 32/64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 M380
  • Memory: 32 MB RAM
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Bulorgus

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu or Other
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 M380
  • Memory: 32 MB RAM
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Bulorgus
